import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client'; import './style.css'; const root = ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')); const signUpButton = document.getElementById('signUp'); const signInButton = document.getElementById('signIn'); const container = document.getElementById('container'); signUpButton.addEventListener('click', () => { container.classList.add("right-panel-active"); }); signInButton.addEventListener('click', () => { container.classList.remove("right-panel-active"); }); root.render(
